Source: GMC (gmc-uk.org fees 2026): PLAB1=£283 PLAB2=£1036 GMC reg=£433 GMC retention=£433; UKVI (gov.uk skilled-worker-visa): visa=£769; gov.uk IHS: £1035/yr × 3yr=£3105; OET (occupationalenglishtest.org): AUD$587; IELTS India (britishcouncil.in): INR18000; coaching (MedRevisions/GATEIIT market research): INR8k-105k; MEA attestation; travel/accommodation estimated
Notes: COMPONENT COLUMN VALUES = typical/single-attempt scenario. MIN/TYPICAL/MAX totals reflect different scenarios: Min=1 attempt each exam + IELTS (not OET) + no coaching + budget travel + state accommodation; Typical=1 PLAB1 + 1.5avg PLAB2 attempts + OET + mid-range coaching + 1-2 trips to UK; Max=2 attempts each exam + OET + prep course + full coaching + 2 UK trips + premium accommodation. IHS (Immigration Health Surcharge) at £1035/year is mandatory for 3-year visa = £3105 total = INR383778 — this is the single largest cost. GMC Annual Retention (Year 1) is included in all totals. Skilled Worker Visa fee increased to £769 from April 9 2025 (up from £719). PLAB 2 is held in Manchester — travel and accommodation to UK are mandatory costs not often cited in official breakdowns. Certificate of Sponsorship (CoS) is paid by employer — NOT included. Coaching is optional but strongly recommended. AUD/INR rate 63.42 used for OET fee conversion (Feb 2026 mid-market rate from OFX/Wise).
